sentences.sContent: There are facts which I would not obtrude upon a child.
sentences.sContent_eng: There are facts which I would not obtrude upon a child.
sentences.sCn: 有些事实不应该强加于儿童。

remMethod.val: ob(向外) + trud(伸出) + e → 向外伸 → 突出

trans.tranOther: if something obtrudes, or you obtrude something, it becomes noticeable where it is not wanted
